name: Itadaki Master
description:
You have stolen the mochi of the gods, and now you just want to enjoy it. However, the Tengu have been angered, and are coming to get it back!

Throw shurikens to defeat the Tengu before they get to you.

Click on the mochi beneath you to eat it.

Press Esc to pause the game, but when you click resume you have to press Esc again and click inside the window to resume.  It's a mess.  I apologize.
